MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Llithfaen and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:00PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed the fault has been caused by a low lying overhead line.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, due the repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:50PM on 25th January 2021
